title: 'Shoe cleaner kit'
body: 'I recently purchased the sneaker cleaner kit and I must say it has truly worked wonders on my sneaker collection! This product exceeded my expectations in several ways.  First and foremost its stain-removing power is remarkable. With just a small amount of the cleaner I was able to tackle stubborn stains that had been bothering me for a while. It effectively restored the vibrant colors of my sneakers leaving them looking almost as good as new.'

title: 'Not performing'
body: 'Not able to fully clean sneakers though we keep full pressure in cleaning using the brush and liquid. The dirt and marks remains. Washing machine washing was able to clean up much better. Not value for money. It might be useful to clean up light marks Which anyways can be cleaned up using normal tissues with little water.'

title: 'Great product for cleaning sneakers in quick way'
body: 'Very happy with the product can clean all light coloured sneakers in a very quick n neat way. Thanks to the seller for wonderful product and packaging.'

title: 'Revived My Sneakers: A Must-Have Sneaker Cleaner!'
body: This sneaker cleaner worked wonders on my collection. With just a small amount, it removed stubborn stains and restored the vibrant colors. The brush made application easy, even on delicate materials. It's now a must-have in my shoe care routine, ensuring my sneakers stay fresh and clean. Highly recommended!

title: 'value for money'

title: 'Nothing special'

The most tough part is the white part of sneakers which i expected this solution to keep it shining but their yellowish dullness does not go away with this solution.'

title: It's a scam
body: Never buy this or related products from the company 1) cheap brush, quality is worst and just dipping in water the brush hairs came out 2) the liquid which i recieved it's like jelly never came out of the bottle and the one which I managed to take out a bit has done nothing. Washed my sandals even with my bare hand I'll clean more better than these 2 combination.  Since it's non refundable you won't get any solution, through out is the option because no use of having this  1st it's non-refundable, in Amazon when a product is non-refundable never buy that product it's always scam

title: 'Seems the product quality might have recently been compromised'
body: 'Previously this product had consistently high feedback. However recent feedback has been poor indicating a possible reduction in quality. I am not impressed with the product as the shoes do not look like they have been professionally cleaned as advertised.'

title: 'Not worth the hype
body: '2.0 out of 5 stars'This product was recommended to me by my relative, now I am thinking maybe he hates me üòÇ The reason(s) I found this to be non functional: 1) Some quantity of liquid seems to be missing at the time of receiving ( the bag or bottle wasn't tamper proof) ,it was highlighted to the Amazon Cc executive. 2) The brush is of inferior quality, it lost a lot of bristles in the first use itself. 3) I found no big difference on my white sneakers as compared to something like a vim /surf liquid I was using to wash them earlier around the rubber sole area . In fact washing with vim/sirf liquid yeilded better results. 4) The website shows that the orginal price is around ‚Çπ5400 ( really???? ) and discounted price is ‚Çπ539- ‚Çπ549 . I would say this product is not even worth ‚Çπ100-200.
